oneOf.description: Unbond will start the unbonding process for the given number of tokens. The sender immediately loses weight from these tokens, and can claim them back to his wallet after `unbonding_period`
Claim is used to claim your native tokens that you previously "unbonded" after the contract-defined waiting period (eg. 1 week)
Claim without waiting period, but with percentage fee
This accepts a properly-encoded ReceiveMsg from a cw20 contract

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>

Cw20ReceiveMsg.description: Cw20ReceiveMsg should be de/serialized under `Receive()` variant in a ExecuteMsg
